name: ChubbyBrain
tag_list: investor, startup, venture-capital, angel-investor, green-tech, clean-tech, web2-0, entrepreneur
overview:
ChubbyBrain is an information services platform tracking startups invested in by venture capitalists, angel investors, incubators and university entrepreneurship programs.

The ChubbyBrain platform tracks global startups and investors focused on multiple sectors including but not limited to green/clean tech, healthcare (biotech, medical devices, etc), web2.0, mobile, social enterprise, energy, and industrial.

As of June 2009, the platform had 24,000+ startups and 2400+ investor profiles on its platform. The company is based in New York, NY and was founded by professionals who formerly worked in corporate venture and who most recently managed the $50M Chairman’s Innovation Fund of a Fortune 50 financial services firm.
